snippet.title: Swift: Firebase 3 - Logging in with Email and Password (Ep 3)
snippet.description:
Today, let's enhance our UI to allow users to also log into our chat application by only providing an email and password.  To do so, I'll be going over how to programmatically modify constraints such that toggle a switch will make certain UI elements disappear.  This gets a little tricky but once you see the example, you should understand the concept behind it.

Part 1 - How to Create a Login Page: https://youtu.be/lWSc0wHFTXM
Part 2 - SDK Installation using CocoaPods: https://youtu.be/guFW9aj4EHM

Lazy var explanation: https://youtu.be/DYsfAD01fYk

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/firebase-chat-messenger

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
